data.system_settings: Macbook Air (Early 2015), macOS Sierra 10.12.6, Firefox Quantum 60.0.1 (64-bit)
data.actual_result: It goes out of window and no scroll bar appears
data.expected_result: It is supposed to resize with the window, and become scrollable like on other browsers
data.short_description: Change Log doesn't resize with your browser window size on Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Firefox - Go to settings and open change log - Make your Firefox browser window smaller - Observe
